title: cannot send emails
content: I can receive emails but cannot send them I get a message that says the outgoing server (SMTP) hacksaw-mail.internode.on.net failed Please check your Outgoing server SMTP settings Could you please assist in providing the correct settings so I can check Thankyou Warwick Hack

title: I need to change the email password on one of my POP accounts.  When I got to saved passwords, the passwords for this account were not there.  It contained only the passwords for the second account
content: Tell me what to do, given this surprising finding, to change the password for the account. (windows)
creator: spinach23

title: Thunderbird update interrupted - unable to load or uninstall
content: A recent Thunderbird update (auto update) must've been interrupted, because I keep getting a "Reboot your computer to complete the update" message. I have rebooted many times with no change. I tried to uninstall Thunderbird, but get the same message. I also tried to reinstall it, but no change. The Thunderbird icon has also changed to a computer with a disk in the front. Any ideas??
creator: bronman

title: Comcast issues
content: Please help me. I've been with Thunderbird for many years and now I have nothing but problems. I've attempted to change settings and I'm thinking that possibly I've screwed it all up. I've changed the passwords through Comcast a few times but it seems to also be screwed up. I've been with Thunderbird for a long time and donated 3 times this past year. Now I have constant problems signing in with the same old password so I've contacted Comcast to change the passwords. Is there anywhere on Thunderbird where I can check to see what passwords are still listed for me? I have 4 email addresses. SillySam, LatonHigh, Kissincousin and TahoeDocTom all with Comcast.net I'm desperate to get back online with my emails.
creator: sillysam
